TopicTitle: I need help with some bug in loading.

Articles.Content: I need some technical support, Before I got the breaking ground DLC I had airplane mods installed. I forgot the name of the mod but it is a very popular mod, I also had Steam workshop vehicles. I dont want to uninstall and reinstall KSP cause I have some great vehicles, Im also slightly worried about deleting the stuff and validating steam files after. Please help
Then go to your GameData folder, look which mods you actually have and search for updates or known incompatibilities.
I think CKAN can export and detect the mod you've instslled
